verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* of good \w things|strong="G0018"\w* to \w come|strong="G3195"\w*, \add and\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G1504"\w* \w very|strong="G0846"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of the \w things|strong="G4229"\w*, \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w with|strong="G2378"\w* \w those|strong="G0846"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* year \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w* \w continually|strong="G1336"\w* \w make|strong="G5048"\w* the \w comers|strong="G4334"\w* thereunto \w perfect|strong="G5048"\w*.

For \w then|strong="G1893"\w* would \w they|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* have \w ceased|strong="G3973"\w* to be \w offered|strong="G4374"\w*? \w because|strong="G1223"\w* that the \w worshippers|strong="G3000"\w* \w once|strong="G0530"\w* \w purged|strong="G2508"\w* should have \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G0846"\w* \add sacrifices there is\add* a remembrance \w again|strong="G0364"\w* \add made\add* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \add it is\add* not \w possible|strong="G0102"\w* \w that|strong="G0851"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w bulls|strong="G5022"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w goats|strong="G5131"\w* should take \w away|strong="G0851"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* when he \w cometh|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w offering|strong="G4376"\w* thou \w wouldest|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* a \w body|strong="G4983"\w* hast thou \w prepared|strong="G2675"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*:

In burnt \w offerings|strong="G3646"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add sacrifices\add* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* thou hast \w had|strong="G2106"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w pleasure|strong="G2106"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* said \w I|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Lo|strong="G2400"\w*, I \w come|strong="G2240"\w* (\w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w volume|strong="G2777"\w* of the \w book|strong="G0975"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*,) to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, O \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Above|strong="G0511"\w* \w when|strong="G3754"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w offering|strong="G4376"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="G3646"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add offering\add* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* thou \w wouldest|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* hadst \w pleasure|strong="G2106"\w* \add therein\add*; \w which|strong="G3748"\w* are \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*;

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* said \w he|strong="G2046"\w*, \w Lo|strong="G2400"\w*, I \w come|strong="G2240"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, O \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. He taketh \w away|strong="G0337"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w establish|strong="G2476"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w*.

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2307"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w offering|strong="G4376"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w once|strong="G2178"\w* \add for all\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w standeth|strong="G2476"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w* \w ministering|strong="G3008"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w offering|strong="G4374"\w* \w oftentimes|strong="G4178"\w* \w the|strong="G2378"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="G2378"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* take \w away|strong="G4014"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* this \w man|strong="G0846"\w*, after he had \w offered|strong="G4374"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G1336"\w*, sat \w down|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

From \w henceforth|strong="G3063"\w* \w expecting|strong="G1551"\w* \w till|strong="G2193"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w* be \w made|strong="G5087"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w footstool|strong="G5286"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* by \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w offering|strong="G4376"\w* he hath \w perfected|strong="G5048"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G1336"\w* them that are \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w*.

\add Whereof\add* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* is a \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* that he had said \w before|strong="G4280"\w*,

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \add is\add* the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I will \w make|strong="G1303"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, I will \w put|strong="G1325"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w laws|strong="G3551"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w minds|strong="G1271"\w* will I \w write|strong="G1924"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w iniquities|strong="G0458"\w* will I \w remember|strong="G3415"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w remission|strong="G0859"\w* of \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \add is, there is\add* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w offering|strong="G4376"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* enter \w into|strong="G1529"\w* the \w holiest|strong="G0039"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*,

By \w a|strong="G3598"\w* \w new|strong="G4372"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w consecrated|strong="G1457"\w* for \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w veil|strong="G2665"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* is to \w say|strong="G2076"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add having\add* \w an|strong="G2409"\w* \w high|strong="G3173"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

Let us draw \w near|strong="G4334"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w a|strong="G2588"\w* \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* full \w assurance|strong="G4136"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w having|strong="G4472"\w* our \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="G4472"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w an|strong="G4893"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* our \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w washed|strong="G3068"\w* \w with|strong="G5204"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*.

Let us hold \w fast|strong="G2722"\w* the \w profession|strong="G3671"\w* \w of|strong="G1680"\w* \add our\add* \w faith|strong="G1680"\w* without \w wavering|strong="G0186"\w*; (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G1861"\w* \add is\add* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* that \w promised|strong="G1861"\w*;)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* let us \w consider|strong="G2657"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w provoke|strong="G3948"\w* unto \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2041"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*:

\w Not|strong="G3361"\w* \w forsaking|strong="G1459"\w* the \w assembling|strong="G1997"\w* of \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w together|strong="G1997"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w manner|strong="G1485"\w* of \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \add is\add*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w exhorting|strong="G3870"\w* \add one another\add*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* so \w much|strong="G5118"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w*, \w as|strong="G3745"\w* ye \w see|strong="G0991"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w approaching|strong="G1448"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G0264"\w* \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w wilfully|strong="G1596"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* that we have \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, there \w remaineth|strong="G0620"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="G2378"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*,

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w fearful|strong="G5398"\w* looking \w for|strong="G1561"\w* of \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fiery|strong="G4442"\w* \w indignation|strong="G2205"\w*, \w which|strong="G2068"\w* \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* \w devour|strong="G2068"\w* the \w adversaries|strong="G5227"\w*.

He \w that|strong="G5100"\w* \w despised|strong="G0114"\w* \w Mosesâ€™|strong="G3475"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w mercy|strong="G3628"\w* \w under|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*:

Of how \w much|strong="G4214"\w* \w sorer|strong="G5501"\w* \w punishment|strong="G5098"\w*, suppose \w ye|strong="G1380"\w*, shall he be thought \w worthy|strong="G0515"\w*, who hath trodden under \w foot|strong="G2662"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w counted|strong="G2233"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*, \w where|strong="G3739"\w*\w with|strong="G1722"\w* he was \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w*, an unholy \w thing|strong="G2839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath done despite \w unto|strong="G1796"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* him that hath \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Vengeance|strong="G1557"\w* \add belongeth\add* unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will \w recompense|strong="G0467"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shall \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\add It is\add* a fearful \w thing|strong="G5398"\w* to \w fall|strong="G1706"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of \w the|strong="G2316"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* call to \w remembrance|strong="G0363"\w* \w the|strong="G2250"\w* \w former|strong="G4386"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w*, after ye were \w illuminated|strong="G5461"\w*, ye \w endured|strong="G5278"\w* \w a|strong="G0119"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w fight|strong="G0119"\w* of \w afflictions|strong="G3804"\w*;

\w Partly|strong="G5124"\w*, whilst ye were made a \w gazingstock|strong="G2301"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* by \w reproaches|strong="G3680"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w afflictions|strong="G2347"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w partly|strong="G5124"\w*, whilst ye \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w companions|strong="G2844"\w* of them that \w were|strong="G0390"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w used|strong="G0390"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye had \w compassion|strong="G4834"\w* of \w me|strong="G3450"\w* in my \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G4327"\w* \w joyfully|strong="G5479"\w* the \w spoiling|strong="G0724"\w* \w of|strong="G5224"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w goods|strong="G5224"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1097"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* that ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w a|strong="G5223"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* an \w enduring|strong="G3306"\w* \w substance|strong="G5223"\w*.

\w Cast|strong="G0577"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w away|strong="G0577"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* recompence of \w reward|strong="G3405"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* of \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, after ye have \w done|strong="G4160"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, ye might \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* a \w little|strong="G3397"\w* \w while|strong="G3745"\w*, and he that shall \w come|strong="G2064"\w* will \w come|strong="G2240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G5549"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w tarry|strong="G5549"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w just|strong="G1342"\w* shall \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \add any man\add* draw \w back|strong="G5288"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* shall \w have|strong="G2106"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w pleasure|strong="G2106"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* of them who draw \w back|strong="G5289"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* of them that \w believe|strong="G4102"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w saving|strong="G4047"\w* of the \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*.
